N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 6022.2 - Statement of purpose

State Regulations
(a) These regulations are intended to promote
continued instruction and study in the attitudes, knowledge, skills and
procedures involved in carrying out the duties and responsibilities of police
work above and beyond the fundamentals covered in the basic course for police
officers and the course in police supervision. (b) This Part sets forth specific
requirements associated with the administration of in-service training courses
and rules governing the attendance/completion of such courses. Notes
